description: A new and evolved version of their, slim, straight fit, travel pant. Drawstring closure that wraps entire waistband with zipper fly, front extended long zip pocket with internal stash sleeve intended to accommodate all travel documents. Back patch pocket with button closure and small stash pocket at back yoke for quick cell phone storage. The back yoke vented mesh panel now constructed with laser cut perforations for breathability and comfort.
name: Roark Layover Pants 2.0 - Mens
